mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mail_account (user_id, email_address, display_name, smtp_host, smtp_port, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{emailAddress}, #{displayName}, #{smtpHost}, #{smtpPort}, #{isDefault})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mail_account WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1 LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM mail_account WHERE LOWER(email_address) = LOWER(#{emailAddress}) LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mail_account SET is_default = 0 WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mail_account WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_default = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE mail_account SET is_default = #{isDefault} WHERE id = #{id}
